title: The Quest for the Unbreakable Password

nodes.speaker: Dr. Strong
nodes.text: Hi there! I'm Dr. Strong. The Hacker Lord is causing trouble again. Do you know how to build a strong password to stay safe?

nodes.speaker: Hacker Lord
nodes.text: Hehehe… You think you are ready? Then tell me… Is 'Password123' strong?

nodes.speaker: Hacker Lord
nodes.text: 'Password123'? I cracked that before breakfast! Your shield breaks right away—better learn from Dr. Strong!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Strong
nodes.text: You're right! Weak passwords break fast. But knowing that isn't enough—let's build a truly strong one.

nodes.speaker: Dr. Strong
nodes.text: A strong password is your best shield. Make it long—at least 12 characters—and mix letters, numbers, and symbols.

nodes.speaker: Dr. Strong
nodes.text: To build a tough password, remember four key ideas: Length, mix of characters, uniqueness, and keeping it secret!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Strong
nodes.text: Length makes hackers work harder. Complexity mixes upper and lower letters, numbers, and symbols. Uniqueness means you never reuse it. Secrecy means you don’t share it—even with your cat.

nodes.speaker: Dr. Strong
nodes.text: Which method will you use to create your password?

options.text: Let a password manager create one!

nodes.speaker: Hacker Lord
nodes.text: Ha! I cracked that in seconds. You need a better plan!

nodes.speaker: Hacker Lord
nodes.text: No… impossible! This password… I cannot break it! But I’ll return!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Strong
nodes.text: Password managers are like super-safe notebooks that store and create strong passwords for you. Great choice!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Strong
nodes.text: You built an unbreakable password! The Hacker Lord runs away. Remember: long, mixed, unique—and kept secret!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Strong
nodes.text: Story <The Quest for the Unbreakable Password> complete! More cyber adventures are waiting for you.

nodes.speaker: System
nodes.text: (A new article <Strong Password Learn Guide> is now in your Traveler's journal.)
